name: Refinish Network - Paintboss VR
description: Can you make it as a painter? Put your skills to the test and let your creativity flow inside this paint booth simulator. Featuring realistic spray gun behavior that simulates a real world spraying pattern. Choose from multiple vehicles, including a plane.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Processor: Intel I5 or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
